text: Microrhodopina flavescens is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Microrhodopina. It was described by Breuning in 1982.Biolib.cz - Microrhodopina flavescens. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1982 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Microrhodopina
